messages.messageBody:
sorry, it is hard to get the site address when using babelfish...all
the links below should work just fine

This is a Japanese site I just found today...this webmaster takes S.H.
fanaticism to a new level folks...must see
http://babelfish.altavista.com

page 1
http://homepage3.nifty.com/sineitai/html/siseki-t-fujita01.htm
she retraces where his house is located by following directions in
Shizuko Akama's book...very good digitial pics

page 2
http://homepage3.nifty.com/sineitai/html/siseki-t-fujita02.htm
his house is located on a hill and it is now a vacant lot
